title: Multi-Realism Image Compression with a Conditional Generator. (arXiv:2212.13824v2 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: By optimizing the rate-distortion-realism trade-off, generative compression approaches produce detailed, realistic images, even at low bit rates, instead of the blurry reconstructions produced by rate-distortion optimized models. However, previous methods do not explicitly control how much detail is synthesized, which results in a common criticism of these methods: users might be worried that a misleading reconstruction far from the input image is generated. In this work, we alleviate these concerns by training a decoder that can bridge the two regimes and navigate the distortion-realism trade-off. From a single compressed representation, the receiver can decide to either reconstruct a low mean squared error reconstruction that is close to the input, a realistic reconstruction with high perceptual quality, or anything in between. translated_title: 使用有条件生成器的多现实图像压缩

tldr: 本文提出了一种多现实图像压缩方法，采用条件生成器控制失真和真实感的权衡，从而可以生成逼真的图像，缓解了以前方法合成细节不可控的问题。该方法在失真-真实感方面取得了业界领先的效果。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a multi-realism image compression method that controls the trade-off between distortion and realism using a conditional generator, allowing for the generation of realistic images and addressing the issue of previously uncontrollable synthesized details. The method achieves state-of-the-art results in distortion-realism.
